column1: Uchi////We also went in on a Saturday evening at 8:30pm with no reservation
column2: and we were seated pretty quickly for a table of 5
column3: so try your luck. Hopefully you'll wind up at the sushi bar which is my favorite spot to be so you can chat with the sushi chef
column4: but a table is fine as well. This is in my top 5 places in Houston...or actually maybe even the world....
